pkgmetadata.longdescription: Gjdoc provides a framework for generating documentation in various formats from java source files. It implements all features of the traditional javadoc tool version 1.4 - except for one unimplemented option (-serialwarn), it is fully command-line compatible and it provides a compatible Doclet API (package com.sun.javadoc).

use.flag: Also build support for the xml doclet that generates output in xml instead of the traditional html javadoc.
